item.title: Useful Linux Packages
item.description:
1. joe: to generate .gitignore files when needed
    1. joe g java,node,osx > .gitignore : create new gitignore
    2. joe g OSX,SublimeText » ~/.gitignore : appends to existing one
    3. joe ls : what tags can be used
  2. ledger
  3. ffsend: firefox send function
  4. hexyl: hex viewer
  5. tldr
  6. nemesis
  7. bed : binary editor
  8. builtwith site: to find what technology the site is using
  9. malc0de.com/database: search for malware
  10. thispersondoesnotexist.com – get a fake face
  11. generated.photos
  12. mkcert: just make certificates
